Error Codes.method_of_check: Check the power supply
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Confirm the power supply-

Error Codes.method_of_check: Fan motor Operate without lead wire for Fan motor Check the electric continuity of Fuse by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the same error code appears again, Main PCB or Pump should be replaced If other error codes appear, Fan motor should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, Temp. Discharge Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.error: Protective action against excess Current DC current detection Unreasonable operation under/overload
Error Codes.method_of_check: Check the place of installation (blockage of air inlet & outlet) Check the excess gas Ensure the installation position to avoid blockage of air inlet & outlet
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If excess gas is observed, collect all refrigerant once, then recharge with prescribed mass

Error Codes.method_of_check: Main PCB
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Main PCB should be replaced

Error Codes.error: Protective action against excess Current AC current detection Unreasonable operation under/overload
Error Codes.method_of_check: Check the place of installation (blockage of air inlet & outlet) Check the excess gas Ensure the installation position to avoid blockage of air inlet & outlet
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If excess gas is observed, collect all refrigerant once, then recharge with prescribed mass

Error Codes.method_of_check: Check the place of installation (blockage of air inlet & outlet) Check the excess gas Ensure the installation position to avoid blockage of air inlet & outlet
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If excess gas is observed, collect all refrigerant once, then recharge with prescribed mass

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, Temp. Suction Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, Temp. Defrost Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, Temp. Discharge Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Fuse CF7 (250V T3.15A) Check the electric continuity Fuse CF7 by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If CF7 is blown, Fan motor and CF7 should be replaced If CF7 is not blown, check the voltage of Fan motor If the voltage is normal, Fan motor should be replaced If the voltage is abnormal, Main PCB should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, Temp. Outdoor Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Fuse CF6 (HPID16: 250V T3.15A) Check the electric continuity of Fuse CF6 by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If CF6 is blown, it should be replaced

Error Codes.error: Rise of temperature (above 110°C) of Main PCB
Error Codes.method_of_check: Mis-installation Check the place of installation (blockage of air inlet & outlet) Ensure the installation position to avoid blockage of air inlet & outlet
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Main PCB should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, Temp. Main PCB
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Main PCB should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Main PCB
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Main PCB should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Mis wiring or rare contact [Main PCB - Controller PCB connecting cable]
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Check the wiring connection and rare contact After correcting mis wiring, restart operation

Error Codes.method_of_check: Turn off the power supply, wait for about 3 minutes, then power up again
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the same error code appears, Main PCB should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, Temp. Outgoing water Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, Temp. Return water Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.error: High pressure switch is operating (HPID13R32 & HPID17R32)
Error Codes.method_of_check: Outside air recirculation Check temperature difference of Outgoing/Return water (see Monitor display function) Large difference means flow rate is too low Make sure the position doesn’t block the air inlet and outlet
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Clogged water circuit Remove the blockage, then restart operation

Error Codes.method_of_check: Pump (*2) Check the voltage of Pump
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the voltage is normal, Pump should be replaced If the voltage is abnormal, Main PCB should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: High pressure switch Check loose cable connections and contacts
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the same error code appears, high pressure switch should be replaced

Error Codes.error: Compressor overheat protection relay operation (HPID13R32 & HPID17R32)
Error Codes.method_of_check: Compressor overheat protection relay Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the compressor overheat protection relay is blown, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: PCB(Controller) and PCB(EEPROM)
Error Codes.troubleshooting: PCB(Controller) and PCB(EEPROM) should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, temperature DHW tank Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, temperature outdoor Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, temperature thermal store Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, temperature Mix water Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Sensor, Humidity Check the resistance by tester
Error Codes.troubleshooting: If the sensor is faulty, it should be replaced

Error Codes.method_of_check: Incorrect remote controller wiring or DIP SW setting
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Check loose cable connections and contacts Check DIP SW setting After having corrected the wiring and DIP SW setting, restart operation

Error Codes.method_of_check: Incorrect remote controller wiring
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Check loose cable connections and contacts After having corrected the wiring, restart operation

Error Codes.method_of_check: Incorrect main PCB wiring
Error Codes.troubleshooting: Check loose cable connections and contacts After having corrected the wiring, restart operation
